snippet: Yahoo is getting another lift from its stake China's Alibaba Group, a thriving Internet company that has helped mask Yahoo's own financial funk....

headline.print_headline: Yahoo Stock Surges in Anticipation of Alibaba IPO
headline.main: Yahoo Stock Surges in Anticipation of Alibaba IPO

lead_paragraph: Yahoo is getting another lift from its stake China's Alibaba Group, a thriving Internet company that has helped mask Yahoo's own financial funk.
